alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Volusia County through 700 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Smyrna Beach, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Orange, New Smyrna Beach, South Daytona, Daytona Beach Shores and Ponce Inlet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
